Premeditation.definition: an act or instance of premeditating ;specif
Premeditation.origin: [designed so that it requires to tamper with it]

1.1: an act or instance of premeditating

2.1: consideration or planning of an act beforehand [designed so that it requires to tamper with it] [murder in the first degree is the killing of a human being committedâ€¦intentionally and with "
2.note: The termspremeditationmalice aforethoughtdeliberate, andwillfulare often used in statutes either along with or instead ofintentto describe the necessary mental state for a crime. In some jurisdictions the premeditation has to occur only moments before the act, while in others it must precede the act by an appreciable amount of time.
